course_description: Students will apply their accumulated knowledge from their undergraduate experience at Emory to simulate a consultant/client model. The consultant model allows students to apply theories and concepts learned in other classes to a practical situation. Fulfills an ENVS Independent Study
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or  BIOL_OX 111 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
